entity.name: Narendra Modi
entity.description: Prime Minister of India Narendra Modi

text:
@narendramodi Have you considered the danger in opening up everything simultaneously? COVID-19 is exploding and we don't have the resources to treat patients.
It SHOULD always have been Restricted Opening, Stabilise new patients and once numbers come down, Open more sectors, treat, stabilise..
